CustomField.description: List of the Record Create Fields that determine the order in the Record Create LWC. Enter the api names separated by a comma in the desired order, using BLANK_FIELD to insert a space. Any fields not indicated will show in random order after the indicated fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of the Record Create Fields that determine the order in the Record Create LWC. Enter the api names separated by a comma in the desired order, using BLANK_FIELD to insert a space. Any fields not indicated will show in random order after the indicated fields.
CustomField.label: Order
